titleStmt.title: Read, try, judge, and speak as you find. At the Black Ball and Old Lillys Head, next door to the Feather shops that are within Black-Friers Gate-way, which is over against Ludgate Church, just by Ludgate in London (through God's mercy to do good) now liveth J. Case, who succeeds in the room of Mr. Tho. Saffold lately deceased, who is an approved and licensed physician and student in astrology. Of him the sick may have advice for nothing.
titleStmt.author: Case, John, Dr.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Advertisements for the services of Dr. John Case, and for Saffold's Pills.
